attributes.additional_details:
This petition is is about people who want personal operations on the NHS, and by personal we mean, breast jobs, and sex changes.

While the Government keep making cut backs they are still willing to shell out thousands of pounds for people to have sex changes and change their body for no reason.

 We think if you want to change your body for personal gain then you should have to save up the money for yourself. whilst child tax credits are even getting cut they need the money more than you!

If there is a reason you want to change your body like illness or disease than that is fair enough. but we should not be paying for you to change your body just because you want to.
